name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: A spicy and savory stir-fry dish made with chicken, peanuts, and vegetables.
author: Zhang Han
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breast, cut into bite-sized pieces
cooking_method: In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, rice vinegar, cornstarch, sugar, and sesame oil.
In a large skillet or wok, heat the vegetable oil over high heat.
Add the chicken and stir-fry until browned and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the ginger and garlic and stir-fry for another 30 seconds.
Add the scallions and peanuts and stir-fry for another 30 seconds.
Add the sauce mixture and stir-fry for another 30 seconds, until the sauce thickens and coats the chicken and vegetables.
Serve hot with rice.

name: Dumplings
description: Small pockets of dough filled with meat or vegetables, typically served in a steaming hot broth.
